Schnittstelle QuizDataInterface

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
DataManager, DBManager, QuizDataManager
public interface QuizDataInterface
Interface defining the contract for quiz data persistence operations.

Implementations can use diverse storage backends such as:

  • MariaDB relational database (see: persistence.mariaDB package)
  • File-based serialization (see: persistence.serialization package)
This interface provides CRUD operations for:
  • Themes
  • Questions
  • Answers
as well as retrieval and random selection methods.

All return types use DTO classes from the quizlogic.dto package.

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos

  • Methodendetails

    • getRandomQuestion

      QuestionDTO getRandomQuestion()
      Gets a random question from all available questions in storage.
      Gibt zurück:
      a random QuestionDTO or null if no questions are available

    • getRandomQuestionFor

      QuestionDTO getRandomQuestionFor(ThemeDTO theme)
      Gets a random question from a specific theme.
      Parameter:
      theme - the ThemeDTO to select a question from
      Gibt zurück:
      a random QuestionDTO or null if no questions are available for that theme

    • getAllThemes

      ArrayList<ThemeDTO> getAllThemes()
      Retrieves all available quiz themes from storage.
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of ThemeDTO containing all themes

    • saveTheme

      String saveTheme(ThemeDTO theme)
      Saves a theme to persistent storage.

      If the theme is new (ID not set), it will be created; otherwise, it will be updated.

      Parameter:
      theme - the ThemeDTO to save
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message, or null if successful without message

    • deleteTheme

      String deleteTheme(ThemeDTO theme)
      Deletes a theme from storage.
      Parameter:
      theme - the ThemeDTO to delete
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message, or null if deleted successfully

    • getQuestionsFor

      ArrayList<QuestionDTO> getQuestionsFor(ThemeDTO theme)
      Retrieves all questions associated with a given theme.
      Parameter:
      theme - the ThemeDTO to fetch questions for
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of QuestionDTO belonging to that theme

    • saveQuestion

      String saveQuestion(QuestionDTO question)
      Saves a quiz question to storage.

      If new, it will be inserted; if it already exists, it will be updated.

      Parameter:
      question - the QuestionDTO to save
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message, or null if successful without message

    • deleteQuestion

      String deleteQuestion(QuestionDTO question)
      Deletes a quiz question from storage.
      Parameter:
      question - the QuestionDTO to delete
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message, or null if deleted successfully

    • getAnswersFor

      ArrayList<AnswerDTO> getAnswersFor(QuestionDTO question)
      Retrieves all answers associated with a given question.
      Parameter:
      question - the QuestionDTO to fetch answers for
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of AnswerDTO belonging to that question

    • saveQuestion

      default String saveQuestion(QuestionDTO question, ThemeDTO theme)
      Saves a question and associates it with a theme (extended method).
      Parameter:
      question - the QuestionDTO to save
      theme - the ThemeDTO to associate with
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message

    • saveAnswer

      default String saveAnswer(AnswerDTO answer, QuestionDTO question)
      Saves an answer and associates it with a question (extended method).
      Parameter:
      answer - the AnswerDTO to save
      question - the QuestionDTO to associate with
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message

    • saveQuizSession

      default String saveQuizSession(QuizSessionDTO session)
      Saves a completed quiz session to persistent storage.
      Parameter:
      session - the QuizSessionDTO to save
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message, or null if successful without message

    • getAllQuizSessions

      default ArrayList<QuizSessionDTO> getAllQuizSessions()
      Retrieves all saved quiz sessions from storage.
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of QuizSessionDTO containing all historical sessions

    • getRecentQuizSessions

      default ArrayList<QuizSessionDTO> getRecentQuizSessions(int limit)
      Retrieves the most recent quiz sessions from storage.
      Parameter:
      limit - maximum number of sessions to retrieve
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of QuizSessionDTO containing recent sessions
